ckScr Class Reference
[ckDraw -- Graphics module]

A screen, which has a rectangle area and an order for drawing. More...

Detailed Description

A screen, which has a rectangle area and an order for drawing.

Member Function Documentation

ckScr* ckScr::getPrevN (  )  const

Returns the previous screen.

If the first screen doesn't exist, returns NULL.

ckScr* ckScr::getNextN (  )  const

Returns the next screen.

If the next screen doesn't exit, returns NULL.
